p: The chemical composition and pharmacological effects of the essential oil of Pterodon polygalaeflorus Benth (EOPPgfl) seeds have been previously investigated ( 15, 16). It has demonstrated antispasmodic action on tracheal smooth muscle by blockade of voltage-operated calcium channels ( 15) and on intestinal smooth muscle by myogenic mechanisms, mainly mediated through an intracellular mechanism ( 16).
